pkgmetadata.longdescription: Radiometric and Topographic Correction of Satellite Imagery // Processing of Landsat or other multispectral satellite imagery. Includes relative normalization, image-based radiometric correction, and topographic correction options. The original package description was published as Goslee (2011) doi:10.18637/jss.v043.i04, and details of the topographic corrections in Goslee (2012) doi:10.14358/PERS.78.9.973.
